title: Convex skill (CLI wrapper)
description: Create a Convex skill that wraps the npx convex CLI. Progressive disclosure architecture. Provides workflows for common Convex operations: dev server, deployment, function execution, data import/export, schema management.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Create SKILL.md router (~50 lines) with workflow references
Create workflows/dev.md for starting convex dev server
Create workflows/run-function.md for executing Convex functions
Auto-detect if in Convex project (convex/ directory exists)
Handle CONVEX_DEPLOY_KEY from 1Password for production deploys
